ai-patthana15.55:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.55:0.3_0: Talking for the sake of seeing the profitable things, etc., have profitable roots in the same way.
ai-patthana15.55:1.1_0: Without seeing, you should give up causes and conditions for the sake of not seeing, because of a cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.55:2.1_0: With seeing the cause, unskillful qualities should be given up by seeing, not seeing, incapable of the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.55:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.55:3.1_0: Not seeing the cause, without reason, they give up no cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.55:3.1_1: ... two conditions for the sake of the objects.”
ai-patthana15.55:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.55:3.1_3: In each case, he should be extrated to each higher stage;
